_description: ‘Te Deum Laudamus’, a Christmas carol — three 5-line stanzas (ababc) with this refrain and 3-line burden: ‘T[e deum] laudamus / Te dominum confitemur / Te eternum’

BLAdd5665.First Lines:
A blesse god in triniteGrete cause we haue to blesse þy
                    name…
BLAdd5665.Last Lines:
…Geff laude & þangkes deuotelyeTo god abowe and syng
                    hym toTe deum [laudamus]
